content.en: Defect detection revolution: Researchers are exploring the use of various algorithms to improve the accuracy of defect detection and classification in different industries. These algorithms include deep learning recognition algorithms, surface defect-generation adversarial networks, improved generative adversarial networks, convolutional neural network-based methods, and more. By leveraging these algorithms, scientists aim to enhance the capabilities of automated systems in identifying and categorizing defects, leading to improved quality control and efficiency in manufacturing processes.
content.da: Fejldetektion revolution: Forskere undersøger brugen af forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre nøjagtigheden af fejldetektion og klassifikation i forskellige industrier. Disse algoritmer omfatter dyb læring genkendelsesalgoritmer, overfladefejl-genererende adversarielle netværk, forbedrede genererende adversarielle netværk, metoder baseret på konvolutionelle neurale netværk og mere. Ved at udnytte disse algoritmer sigter forskere mod at styrke automatiserede systemers evner til at identificere og kategorisere fejl, hvilket fører til forbedret kvalitetskontrol og effektivitet i fremstillingsprocesser.
